Reference

All functions

bdi_compute()

Compute all BDI data from questionnaire

bdi_compute_sum()

Calculate sum of BDI

bdi_factorise()

Factorize BDI sum

bdi_restructure()

Restructure BDI questions from wide format

compute_time_in_bed()

Compute time in bed

edu_compile()

Compile education across sources

edu_compute()

Fill inn Education in MOAS

edu_factorise() edu4_factorise() edu9_factorise()

Create factor from education vector

edu_levels() edu4_levels() edu9_levels()

Get education levels scheme

edu_levels2name() edu4_levels2name() edu9_levels2name()

Alter levels to name

edu_map() edu_map_chr() edu_map_num()

Create a mapped table for conversion

edu_reduce() edu9_reduce()

Reduce education categories

edu_to_years() edu4_to_years() edu9_to_years()

Turn education data to years

ehi_change()

Create vector with only correct values

ehi_compute()

Edinburgh handedness inventory

ehi_compute_lq()

Laterality Quotient

ehi_factorise_lq() ehi_factorise_lqa()

Factorise laterality quotient

ehi_factorise_nominal()

Nominal laterality factor

ehi_values()

Sum EHI columns

gds_alter_values()

Change coding of GDS to correct numeric values

gds_binary()

Binerise GDS values

gds_compute()

Compute GDS score

gds_compute_sum()

Compute the GDS sum

gds_factorise()

Factorise the GDS sum

gds_values()

Specify coding scheme for GDS questions

ipaq_compute()

Compute all the IPAQ components

ipaq_compute_met()

Compute MET from IPAQ

ipaq_compute_sum()

Calculate the IPAQ sum

ipaq_mets()

IPAQ mets

ipaq_time_alter()

Alter the time instant columns to decminals

is_hm()

Utility function to locate hm columns

is_hms()

Utility function to locate hms columns

psqi_compute()

Compute all PSQI components and global score

psqi_compute_comp2()

Compute component PSQI 2

psqi_compute_comp3()

Compute component PSQI 3

psqi_compute_comp4()

Compute component PSQI 4

psqi_compute_comp5()

Compute component PSQI 5

psqi_compute_comp7()

Calculate component 7 of PSQI

psqi_compute_global()

Compute Global PSQI component

tas_compute()

Compute the TAS factors

time_alter()

Turn strings of H:M to time

time_deci2period()

Turn time into period

time_factor()

Factor time of day

time_hms2deciH()

Turn string time into decimal hour
